title: 84/276/Euratom, ECSC, EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1984 concerning the French Republic pursuant to Article 13 (2) of Regulation (EEC, Euratom, ECSC) No 2892/77 concerning own resources accruing from value added tax (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 April 1984
concerning the French Republic pursuant to Article 13 (2) of Regulation (EEC, Euratom, ECSC) No 2892/77 concerning own resources accruing from value added tax
(Only the French text is authentic)
(84/276/Euratom, ECSC, EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Decision 83/142/EEC, Euratom, ECSC is hereby extended for 1983 and subsequent years.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
